note.p: Career: Professor of Astronomy and Meteorology at Padua
Memberships: Istituto delle Scienze di Bologna
References: A Rupert Hall, 'Further Newton Correspondence' in NR 1982-83 vol 37 pp 7-34

Notes: An alternative election date of 24 Jan 1734 is given in the index to BR and on his certificate; this seems the more likely date as there is a letter of acknowledgement in EL of June 1734. Both election dates are printed in Record. The Journal Book states that he died in 1758.
